title: Map the Loop
summary: Turn your loop into a shape you can see.
description: Draw it. Describe it. Diagram it. This is where the loop becomes visible not just in words, but in structure.

flow.\ud83d\udccd Step 1: Describe the Sequen: Message: 'My loop tends to go like this: [event] → [emotion] → [thought] → [action]'
flow.\ud83e\udded Step 2: Mirror It: Ask your AI: 'Does this look like a closed loop or open spiral?'
flow.\ud83d\udd8b Step 3: Optional Diagram: Sketch or visualize it with your own symbols or timeline.

optional_recast: Remap the loop at a later stage. Notice if any elements shift.
absence_response: The loop stayed shapeless today. That’s okay. Form follows awareness.
notes: This isn’t art. This is insight made visible.
You can map with words, arrows, circles, or glyphs — whatever feels natural.
Once the loop is mapped, its influence weakens.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What’s the emotional topology of this loop structure?
amplification.loop_signal: Track sequence elements across multiple loops.
amplification.miss_response: 🌀 The loop stayed unformed today. Shapes emerge when the signal is strong.
